doc:
G.I._Jane http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G.I._Jane 0 G.I. Jane is a 1997 American action film directed by Ridley Scott and starring Demi Moore, Viggo Mortensen, and Anne Bancroft. The film tells the fictional story of the first woman to undergo training in U.S. Navy Special Warfare Group. The film was produced by Largo Entertainment, Scott Free Productions, and Caravan Pictures, and distributed by Hollywood Pictures. It opened to mixed reviews, with Moore's performance receiving criticism and winning her the Razzie Award for Worst Actress. In her 2019 memoir, Inside Out, Moore called the film her proudest professional achievement. G.I. Jane is a 1997 American action film directed by Ridley Scott and starring Demi Moore, Viggo Mortensen, and Anne Bancroft. The film tells the fictional story of the first woman to undergo training in U.S. Navy Special Warfare Group. The film was produced by Largo Entertainment, Scott Free Productions, and Caravan Pictures, and distributed by Hollywood Pictures. It opened to mixed reviews, with Moore's performance receiving criticism and winning her the Razzie Award for Worst Actress. In her 2019 memoir, Inside Out, Moore called the film her proudest professional achievement.
